item.title: By: Gerard Hartnett
item.dc:creator: Gerard Hartnett
item.description:
Flip it. Just noticed this last night. I've learned my lesson, read Web 2.0 Ireland even if I'm too busy to read blogs.
In any case, I bought my ticket before these free ones came out.
Who else is going? I'm travelling out from Shannon on Sunday. Will be in Boston all week.
item.content:encoded:
Flip it. Just noticed this last night. I’ve learned my lesson, read Web 2.0 Ireland even if I’m too busy to read blogs.

In any case, I bought my ticket before these free ones came out.

Who else is going? I’m travelling out from Shannon on Sunday. Will be in Boston all week.
